name: normality_test_from_database
description: Perform normality tests on one or more numeric columns from a SQLite database table or query.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause (table name or JOIN expression).

numeric_cols.description: List of numeric column names to test for normality.

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (excluding the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: List of parameter values to be substituted into the WHERE clause.

use_log_transform.description: Whether to apply log1p transformation before testing.
